long_description: SmartWool Monolith socks are cool looking. And they feature SmartWool performance, comfort and technology. Need we say more?. Non-cushioned design means you'll hardly feel the Monolith socks in your shoes; tapered, flat-looped toe boxes elminate bulkiness. Merino wool provides excellent temperature control and moisture management, so you're warm when it's cold and cool when it's warm. Wool-on-Wool technology features elastic arches and contoured flex zones to eliminate bunching, slipping and sagging. SmartWool socks are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly machine washed and dried without shrinking. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
